hero.title: Serving & Protecting Sacred Cows
hero.subtitle: गौ सेवा परमो धर्मः (Serving Cows is the Highest Dharma)
hero.description: A sacred space dedicated to the protection and veneration of Desi cows, preserving ancient traditions and spiritual wisdom

sections.title: S3 Gaushala
sections.content: A sanctuary rooted in the timeless Hindu tradition of cow protection and veneration, operating as a wing of the 501(c)3 non-profit S3 Foundation

features.title: Sacred Heritage
features.description: Home to over 200 desi cows, preserving the divine connection between humans and these sacred beings

features.title: Spiritual Sanctuary
features.description: The first traditional Gaushala of its kind in America, maintaining authentic Vedic practices

features.title: Community Service
features.description: Five years of dedicated seva in Memphis, TN, fostering spiritual growth and community harmony

sections.title: Seva Opportunities
sections.content: Join us in the sacred service of Gau Mata through various forms of seva

options.title: Daily Care
options.description: Participate in the daily care and feeding of our sacred cows, an act of profound spiritual significance in Hindu tradition

options.title: Cow Sponsorship
options.description: Form a spiritual connection by sponsoring a cow, participating in their lifelong care and protection

options.title: Visit & Connect
options.description: Experience the divine presence of Gau Mata and participate in traditional rituals and feeding ceremonies

sections.title: Sacred Care
sections.content: Our cows receive care following traditional principles and modern best practices

items.name: Traditional Feed
items.description: Fresh hay and natural feed components selected according to Ayurvedic principles for the optimal health and wellbeing of our sacred cows

items.name: Balanced Nutrition
items.description: Carefully formulated feed incorporating traditional wisdom and modern nutritional science to ensure the health of our divine mothers

sections.title: Join Our Seva
sections.content: Become part of our spiritual family by participating in the sacred service of Gau Mata. Experience the divine blessings that come from serving these sacred beings. Visiting hours: Saturday 10 AM - 3 PM CST

sections.title: Connect With Us
sections.content: Reach out to learn more about our sanctuary and how you can participate in this sacred seva

text.content: The Home of Desi Cows in America
A Cow Sanctuary dedicated to protecting and improving the lives of cows in our community and beyond
A wing of the 501(c)3 non-profit organization, S3 Foundation
There are over 200 desi cows, the largest such cow sanctuary in America
The first ever cow sanctuary of its kind in America
Providing sanctuary for cows for 5 years in Memphis, TN
Celebrate your special occasions by sponsoring a day of nourishment for 200 cows with a $351 donation!
Sponsor a day of cow feed for our 200 Gir cow family
Providing the feed for 200+ cows is possible due to our grassroots community support on a sustained monthly basis. Please consider donating to support all our cows!
Your commitment to adopt a cow means you are providing the necessary care for a cow. You will also be able to name the cow that you adopt. Please contact us for more information!
Come visit the Gaushala to feed the cows and enjoy an experience like no other while connecting to the environment and giving back to the community.
Providing the feed for 200+ cows is possible due to our grassroots community support on a sustained monthly basis. Please consider donating to support all our cows!
Your commitment to adopt a cow means you are providing the necessary care for a cow. You will also be able to name the cow that you adopt. Please contact us for more information!
Come visit the Gaushala to feed the cows and enjoy an experience like no other while connecting to the environment and giving back to the community.
